prompt: A chibi-style character in greyscale construction paper cut-out aesthetic, flat shapes with sharp edges and minimal shading, on transparent background. The face is solid black with no features. The body is in a front-facing centered dynamic pose with one arm raised toward heaven, one pointing to earth, chibi proportions with large multi-faceted crystalline geometric head with unique hexagonal structure suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying Hexagonal. Hair or geometric appendages incorporating hexagonal, fractal, metatron's cube patterns, styled with Power commands influences. Outfit is unique: neutral grey inspired by Emerald and neutral grey inspired by silver structured solid robes with crystalline geometric patterns fused with trigram sashes and Hexagram-patterned robes with flat with sharpie-style lines for stability and grounding, incorporating flexible cotton for adaptation, elaborate with shifting Earth element square motifs and foundational patterns and hexagonal emblem on chest; texture flat with sharpie-style lines for depth. Include subtle accessory like caduceus of communication with intertwined geometric serpents combined with bagua mirror with Hexagonal spiraling energy emanations. Environmental effect: sacred geometric field creating geometric aura patterns around the character with subtle magical essence emanations like crystalline dust wisps and mineral particles. Emulate construction paper layering style exactly, but make this visually unique based on Governor ZAXANIN's profile: 'He who names things', Aethyr TOR, Earth element, Tarot The Magician, Sephirot Hod, Zodiac Gemini, embodying the essence: 'In ZAXANIN's presence, every element falls into a logical pattern an analytical clarity permeates the air, and communication flows with precise articulation.' Resolution 512x512, optimized for layering in Enochian Cyphers game and WebGL rendering with TAP hypertoken metadata embedding.

visual_elements.pose: front-facing centered dynamic pose with one arm raised toward heaven, one pointing to earth
visual_elements.head_shape: large multi-faceted crystalline geometric head with unique hexagonal structure
visual_elements.body_style: angular geometric body with multi-faceted facets, flattened with sharpie-like crease lines
visual_elements.motion_quality: suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying Hexagonal
visual_elements.hair_style: geometric appendages incorporating hexagonal, fractal, metatron's cube patterns, styled with Power commands influences

outfit.base: structured solid robes with crystalline geometric patterns fused with trigram sashes and Hexagram-patterned robes
outfit.texture: flat with sharpie-style lines for stability and grounding, incorporating flexible cotton for adaptation
outfit.details: Earth element square motifs and foundational patterns
outfit.magical_essence: crystalline dust wisps and mineral particles

visual_elements.accessory: caduceus of communication with intertwined geometric serpents combined with bagua mirror
visual_elements.environment_effect: sacred geometric field with faint aura lines

profile_data.title: 'He who names things'
profile_data.essence: In ZAXANIN's presence, every element falls into a logical pattern an analytical clarity permeates the air, and communication flows with precise articulation.
profile_data.angelic_role: Power of Lexicon of Creation; commands emerald soldiers.
profile_data.form_description: A multi-faceted emerald-green crystalline structure that shifts between geometric precision and organic fluidity, representing the Earth element's dual nature of structure and growth
profile_data.color_reasoning: Emerald green represents Earth and Hod's intellectual brilliance, silver-white symbolizes Mercury's mental clarity and the Magician's transformative power
profile_data.geometry_reasoning: Hexagonal structures reflect sacred geometry, fractals represent infinite complexity of knowledge, Metatron's Cube embodies divine information systems
